title: Touchstone Cambridge Classware
description:
Touchstone Cambridge Classware brings the whole package of book, audio and video together in one disc, providing the perfect bridge between teacher-led instruction and student-focused learning. There is no easier way to transform your lessons, encouraging students to interact even more with each other and their learning material Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and, it's all instantly accessible in just one click.

Classware can be used with interactive whiteboards and portable whiteboard devices or simply with a computer and projector. That means, with a minimum of equipment you can display the pages of the course and use the tools to annotate the material and work with the content Ã¢â‚¬â€œ nothing could be easier.
